entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:53 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 1:30 PM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: N 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to flurries this afternoon. Blowing snow. Amount 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
